root: ^Snakes are long and slither on the ground because they don't have legs.
^They can be found in many places around the world. Some snakes can be harmful due to venom, so it's wise to keep a safe distance.
^"No, it’s too dangerous to live with others."

act1_friendly_answer: ^No, the Snake's are not friendly at all.
^"No, it’s too dangerous to live with others."
act1_question2: ^Yes ! Snakes are dangerous and not friendly at all.
